text: Gerald Robert "Jerry" Molen (born January 6, 1935) is an American movie producer. He has worked with Steven Spielberg, having produced five of his movies. He won an Academy Award for co-producing Schindler's List. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:American movie producers Category:Businesspeople from Las Vegas Category:Businesspeople from Montana Category:People from Great Falls, Montana Category:Academy Award winning producers
title: Gerald R. Molen
